Title: Myr vashomy domy!
Writer: Aleksandr Kuznetsov, Vladimir Lert, Andrey Savenko
Actors: Viktor Andrienko, Vladimir Dolinskiy, Evgeniy Knyazev, Aleksandr Kuznetsov
Plot: "Tevye's Daughters" is an authentic tragicomedy directed by Vova Lert. The screenplay is based on the famous play "Memorial Prayer" by Grigori Gorin. This play has been successfully ...
